title: Anyone want to Play?

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
I am bored to death and I am using an old ass account (since I am done leveling my others) 
So hmu and I have discord as well!
It's pretty new but I have it for people I play with


I play all roles!

replies.body:
Jumping in this. Looking for one more. Join!

(We're in game, filled up sorry!)
why do you just have a red dot where your title is suppose to be
good question - I'll have to ask around next week :(
